SELECT A.MNG_NUM,B.MNG_NUM , A.EMP_NUM , (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMP Z WHERE Z.EMP_NUM = A.EMP_NUM) AS MNG_EMP_NM , B.EMP_NUM , (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMP Z WHERE Z.EMP_NUM = B.EMP_NUM) AS USE_EMP_NM , A.CARD_NUM , A.CARD_NAME , A.CARD_DVSN , C.CARD_CMPNY_NAME , TO_CHAR(A.ISSUE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS ISSUE_DT , TO_CHAR(A.END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS END_DT ,TO_CHAR(A.DSCRD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS DSCRD_DT FROM CARD A LEFT JOIN CARD_USER B ON A.MNG_NUM = B.MNG_NUM LEFT JOIN CARD_CMPNY C ON A.CARD_CMPNY_NUM = C.CARD_CMPNY_NUM WHERE CARD_NUM = #{no}
